start.name: Pallet Town
start.description:
Your name is Ash. You have just landed in Pallet Town: a coastal town on an island well-known for its diversity of Pokemon, the first stop for all aspiring Pokemon trainers in the Kanto region. 
The island is surrounded by a beautiful ocean, and the sun is shining brightly. You see a few houses and a small lab in the distance.
start.dialogue: Go north to Professor Oak's lab.

bruh.name: Pallet Town
bruh.description: Why are you back here? Hurry and go back north to Professor Oak's lab!

pol.name: Professor Oak's Lab
pol.description: Filled with pieces of research equipment you could never name, the lab of Professor Oak is humming with a low note. Professor Oak sits at his desk, awaiting your arrival.
pol.dialogue: Hello Ash! You seem ready to start your journey. I've been awaiting a new trainer for a very long time. I believe you are ready to choose your first Pokemon. You can choose between Charmander, Squirtle, or Bulbasaur!

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: Hatched from an egg from Cinnabar Volcano; this little fire lizard has a small flame on its tail.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: Hatched from an egg from Whirlpool Beach. A cute water turtle that enjoys sunbathing.

pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: Hatched from an egg from Grassy Forest, this little grass dinosaur has a bulb on its back that will grow as it evolves.

town north.name: Pallet Town North
town north.description: You are in the northern part of Pallet Town. The houses here are a bit more spaced out, and there is a forked path. The sign pointing west says "Grassy Forest" and the sign pointing east says "Whirlpool Beach". Professor Oak's Lab is behind you to the south.

forestclearing.name: Forest Clearing
forestclearing.description: You are in a clearing in the forest, with lush grass under your feet. The trees are tall and thick, and the air is filled with the sounds of chirping Pokemon. A path leads north deeper into the forest.
forestclearing.dialogue: You can go north to enter forest or south back to the lab.

pokemons.name: Rowlet
pokemons.description: A small, round, avian Pokemon with a leafy bowtie. It is known for its keen eyesight and ability to blend into grassy environments.

forestmiddle.name: Middle of the Forest
forestmiddle.description: You are inside the forest. The trees are dense, and your path is narrow. You can hear the sounds of hidden yet watchful Pokemon all around you. The path you are on runs north-south.
forestmiddle.dialogue: You can go south back to the clearing.

pokemons.name: Treecko
pokemons.description: A little gecko-like Pokemon with a green body and a long tail. It is frail but fast.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.description: An adorable caterpillar-like Pokemon with a green body, yellow circles on its body, and large eyes. It also has a red forked horn on its head.

pokemons.name: Rowlet
pokemons.description: A small, round, avian Pokemon with a leafy bowtie. It is known for its keen eyesight and ability to blend into grassy environments.

forestnorth.name: Northern Forest
forestnorth.description: You are at the northern end of the forest. The trees are getting sparse, and the chirping of Pokemon seems almost absent. A mysterious path leads east, seemingly out of the forest. You can also return south back to the middle of the forest.
forestnorth.dialogue: You can go east deeper into the woods, or south back to the middle of the forest.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.description: An adorable caterpillar-like Pokemon with a green body, yellow circles on its body, and large eyes. It also has a red forked horn on its head.

beachsouth.name: Whirlpool Beach South
beachsouth.description: You come to the beach. The waves are crashing against the shore, and a few Pokemon are playing in the water. A path leads roughly west back to the town.

beachmiddle.name: Whirlpool Beach Middle
beachmiddle.description: You are in the middle of Whirlpool Beach. The water is calm here, and the Pokemon are easier to see now. A path leads east back to the south of the beach.
beachmiddle.dialogue: You can go east back to the south of the beach.

pokemons.name: Mudkip
pokemons.description: A small blue water Pokemon with a fin on its head and a tail that resembles a paddle. It is known for its playful nature, and it spits water at you when it feels scared

pokemons.name: Froakie
pokemons.description: A sneaky little frog-like Pokemon, blue with a white bubble collar. It is known for its agility and ability to jump high.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: A cute turtle-like Pokemon that enjoys sunbathing.

beachnorth.name: Whirlpool Beach North
beachnorth.description: You are at the northern end of Whirlpool Beach. The water is deeper here. A mysterious path through impenetrable woods leads west, and a path leads south back to the middle of the beach.
beachnorth.dialogue: You can go west through the woods, or south back to the middle of the beach.

volcanoeast.name: Volcano East
volcanoeast.description: Emerging from the woods, a giant volcano looms into view. The ground before you is rocky and uneven; the air is hot and filled with a putrid smell. You recognize this as the famous Cinnabar Volcano, known for its fiery Pokemon and treacherous terrain. Go west onto the volcano, or go east back to the beach.
volcanoeast.dialogue: You can go west onto the volcano, or east back to the beach.

pokemons.name: Vulpix
pokemons.description: A small fox-like Pokemon with six orange tails. It can shoot embers from its mouth and control flames.

pokemons.name: Growlithe
pokemons.description: A small, orange dog-like Pokemon with black stripes. It is known for its loyalty and bravery.

volcanowest.name: Volcano West
volcanowest.description: Emerging from the woods, a giant volcano looms into view. The ground before you is rocky and uneven; the air is hot and filled with a putrid smell. You recognize this as the famous Cinnabar Volcano, known for its fiery Pokemon and treacherous terrain. Go east onto the volcano, or go west back to the forest.
volcanowest.dialogue: You can go west back to the northern forest.

pokemons.name: Vulpix
pokemons.description: A small fox-like Pokemon with six orange tails. It can shoot embers from its mouth and control flames.

pokemons.name: Chimchar
pokemons.description: A monkey-like Pokemon with a flame on its tail. It is known for its agility and ability to climb trees.

volcanocaves.name: Volcano Caves
volcanocaves.description: You enter a dark cave inside the volcano. The walls are hot to the touch, and you can hear the sound of bubbling lava nearby. The air smells of sulfur and ash. A faint light glows from the north, and two exits are to the east and west.

volcanonorth.name: Volcano North
volcanonorth.description:
Emerging from the caves, you find yourself at the northern end of the volcano. A formidable mountain range stands before you, stretching for who knows how long. The mountains, immovable guardians of whatever is beyond, watch over you. You sweat at the thought of attempting to climb the steep rocks. 
A path leads roughly west-east here. Behind you to the south is Cinnabar Volcano.

powerplant entrance.name: Gates of Dynavolt Power Plant
powerplant entrance.description: You arrive at the gates of an old power plant, a complex filled with large buildings of unfamiliar shapes. Some sparks fly from the power lines. The plaque at the front reads "Dynavolt Power Plant". Go west into the facility, or east back to the volcano.

powerplant bruh.name: Gates of Dynavolt Power Plant
powerplant bruh.description: Why are you here again? Too scared to explore the complex? Go back west into the facility!
powerplant bruh.dialogue: Why are you here again? Too scared to explore the complex?

powerplant corridor.name: Power Plant Corridor
powerplant corridor.description:
You are in a long corridor that runs east-west. The walls are lined with depictions of strange machinery, and the air is filled with strange odours. 
Before you are two doors: one to the north, and another to the south. The corridor continues west.

powerplant office.name: Dynavolt's Office
powerplant office.description: As you enter the office, you hear momentarily the squeal of a pokemon that must have been startled by your entry and gone to hide. The office has multiple chairs and computers. A door leads south back to the corridor.
powerplant office.dialogue: I'm not here to help, this is your journey!

pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: A cute yellow rodent-like Pokemon; its tail is shaped like a lightning bolt.

powerplant control room.name: Dynavolt's Control Room
powerplant control room.description: You enter a dark room filled with buttons and dials. A buzzing sound permeates this space.

haunted mansion west.name: Mansion West
haunted mansion west.description: You arrive at the door of a large, old mansion. The windows are broken, and the door is slightly ajar. The sign in front that would have declared the house's name long ago is now illegible. A chill runs through you. Go east into the mansion, or west back to the volcano.
